topics.body:
Here, I will count all the sciency-sounding "treatments" sold by quacks.

1. "DNA upgrades".
2. "Tachyon-infused water".
3. "Quantum" anything.
4. "Energy fields".
5. "Antineoplastons".
6. "DNA activation".

There are -probably- definitely tons more out there.
topics.author: 50b70eeb7f123b1a02000097

topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53b757cd6368720b81700000#post_53b757cd6368720b81700000
Pro tip: if the proposed treatment sounds like a science fiction plot device, its probably a fraud.
